name: Banette
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each Special Energy card in your opponent's discard pile.
Attack2Text: Count the number of Basic Pokemon or Evolution cards in your discard pile. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokemon. You can't put more than 6 damage counters on the Defending Pokemon in this way.

name: Claydol
AbilityText: As long as Claydol is your Active Pokemon, each player's Evolved Pokemon pays Colorless more Energy to use its attacks.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the number of basic Energy cards attached to Claydol and the Defending Pokemon.

name: Crobat
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card. Your opponent discards the card you chose.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 3 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokemon between turns.

name: Dark Celebi
Attack1Text: Attach up to 1 Grass or Darkness Energy card from your hand to your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Electrode
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Both Electrode and the Defending Pokemon are now Knocked Out. If Electrode has any Special Energy cards attached to it, this attack does nothing.

name: Exploud
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Heracross
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Pokemon-ex in play, search your deck for up to 2 Grass Energy cards and attach them to Heracross. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Jirachi
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokemon and put it on that Pokemon. (This counts as evolving that Pokemon.) If you do, put 1 damage counter on Jirachi. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Machamp
AbilityText: If your opponent has any Pokemon-ex in play, each of Machamp's attacks do 30 more damage to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Medicham
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each card in your opponent's hand.

name: Metagross
AbilityText: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Metal Energy card attached to 1 of your Benched Pokemon to your Active Pokemon. This power can't be used if Metagross is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Milotic
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you play Milotic from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may remove all damage counters from all of your Pokemon and your opponent's Pokemon (excluding Pokemon-ex).
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, remove 3 damage counters from the Defending Pokemon (all if there are less than 3).

name: Pinsir
AbilityText: Any damage done to Pinsir by attacks from your opponent's Basic Pokemon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Shiftry
Attack1Text: Look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 Basic Pokemon or Evolution card you find there. Your opponent puts it at the bottom of his or her deck.
Attack2Text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage.

name: Walrein
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a basic Energy card, attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. If not, put the card back on your deck. This power can't be used if Walrein is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, each Defending Pokemon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Bellossom
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokemon. You can't use more than 1 Heal Dance Poke-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Bellossom is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition. The Defending Pokemon is now affected by that Special Condition.

name: Chimecho
Attack1Text: Search your opponent's discard pile for a Supporter card and use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack. (The Supporter card remains in your opponent's discard pile.)
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Gorebyss
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Psychic Energy in play.

name: Huntail
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Darkness Pokemon in play.

name: Masquerain
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: During your next turn, if an attack does damage to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 30 more damage.

name: Metang
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Metal Energy card and attach it to Metang.

name: Ninetales
AbilityText: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Ninetales by your opponent's Pokemon-ex.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Rain Castform
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Castform, Sunny Castform, or Snow-cloud Castform and switch it with Rain Castform. (Any cards attached to Rain Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) Shuffle Rain Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw up to 5 cards.
Attack2Text: If Low Pressure System is in play, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Relicanth
AbilityText: As long as Relicanth is your Active Pokemon, a player flips 2 coins for each of his or her Pokemon that is Asleep between turns. If either coin is tails, that Pokemon is still Asleep.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Snow-cloud Castform
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Castform, Rain Castform, or Sunny Castform and switch it with Snow-cloud Castform. (Any cards attached to Snow-cloud Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) Shuffle Snow-cloud Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If Magnetic Storm is in play, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Sunny Castform
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Castform, Rain Castform, or Snow-cloud Castform and switch it with Sunny Castform. (Any cards attached to Sunny Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) Shuffle Sunny Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Stadium card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.
Attack2Text: If High Pressure System is in play, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Tropius
Attack1Text: Move 1 Energy card attached to Tropius to another of your Pokemon and remove 4 damage counters from that Pokemon (all if there are less than 4).

name: Beldum
AbilityText: If Beldum has any Energy attached to it, Beldum's Retreat Cost is 0.

name: Beldum
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Metal Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Beldum is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Put 1 damage counter on Beldum.

name: Castform
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Sunny Castform, Rain Castform, or Snow-cloud Castform and switch it with Castform. (Any cards attached to Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) Shuffle Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Stadium card and play it. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Pokemon-ex, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Claydol
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Corsola
Attack1Text: Draw a number of cards up to the number of your opponent's Basic Pokemon in play. (You can't have more than 10 cards in your hand in this way.)

name: Dodrio
AbilityText: Dodrio can retreat even when it is Asleep or Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Dodrio.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Dodrio can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.

name: Glalie
AbilityText: Any damage done to Glalie by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon with any Special Energy cards attached to it is reduced by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

name: Gloom
Attack1Text: After your attack, remove from Gloom the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon. If Gloom has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Golbat
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Igglybuff
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Jigglypuff from your hand onto Igglybuff (this counts as evolving Igglybuff), and remove all damage counters from Igglybuff.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and a basic Energy card, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Lanturn
AbilityText: Once during your opponent's turn, when any of your Pokemon is Knocked Out by your opponent's attacks, you may use this power. Choose a basic Energy card discarded from the Knocked Out Pokemon and attach it to Lanturn. You can't use more than 1 Energy Grounding Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: You may discard all Lightning Energy attached to Lanturn. If you do, this attack's base damage is 90 instead of 50.

name: Loudred
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, each Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Luvdisc
Attack1Text: Draw cards until you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent has in his or her hand.
Attack2Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch. This attack does 10 damage to the new Defending Pokemon.

name: Machoke
AbilityText: If Machoke is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Machoke is Knocked Out), put 1 damage counter on the Attacking Pokemon.

name: Medicham
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Medicham. After doing damage, remove 1 damage counter from Medicham.

name: Metang
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Put 5 damage counters on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Metang
AbilityText: If Metang has any Energy attached to it, Metang's Retreat Cost is 0.

name: Nuzleaf
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokemon.

name: Rhydon
AbilityText: As long as Rhydon is your Active Pokemon, prevent all damage done by attacks to all of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Poke-Powers or Poke-Bodies, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Sealeo
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Spinda
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If tails, both the Defending Pokemon and Spinda are now Confused.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Spinda.

name: Starmie
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each type of basic Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Swalot
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, count the remaining HP of the Defending Pokemon and Swalot. If the Defending Pokemon has fewer remaining HP than Swalot's, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Tentacruel
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If tails, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokemon between turns.

name: Baltoy
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Beldum
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Put 1 damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Chikorita
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Chinchou
Attack2Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to each of those Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Chinchou
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Clamperl
AbilityText: Any damage done to Clamperl by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Cyndaquil
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Cyndaquil.

name: Feebas
Attack2Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Feebas and put it on Feebas. (This counts as evolving Feebas.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Gulpin
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Jigglypuff
Attack2Text: Each Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Machop
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Machop.

name: Meditite
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Meditite (remove 1 if there is only 1).

name: Meditite
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Minun
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon. Your opponent returns that card to his or her hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Oddish
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Plusle
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, attach a Lightning Energy card from your hand to any of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Rhyhorn
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Rhyhorn does 10 damage to itself.

name: Seedot
Attack1Text: Attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to Seedot.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Shuppet
Attack1Text: You may discard 1 Psychic Energy card attached to Shuppet. If you do, your opponent discards 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Snorunt
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Spheal
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Staryu
AbilityText: If Staryu has any Psychic Energy attached to it, damage done to Staryu by any attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Surskit
Attack1Text: If Surskit has less Energy attached to it than the Defending Pokemon, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Tentacool
AbilityText: If Tentacool has no Energy attached to it, Tentacool's Retreat Cost is 0.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Togepi
Attack1Text: Each Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Totodile
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage for each damage counter on Totodile.

name: Voltorb
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Voltorb. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Vulpix
Attack2Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Vulpix and put it on Vulpix. (This counts as evolving Vulpix.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Whismur
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Zubat
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.
